languages.text: "Теодора полагалась на "устоявшиеся порядки" — и погибла. Я не повторю ее ошибок. Если хочешь и дальше строить будущее протектората фон Валанциус вместе со мной — прекращай жить прошлым".

"Theodora trusted in established procedures — and she died. I won't make the same mistake. If you want to keep building the future of the von Valancius protectorate with me — stop living in the past."
languages.original_text: "Теодора полагалась на "устоявшиеся порядки" — и погибла. Я не повторю ее ошибок. Если хочешь и дальше строить будущее протектората фон Валанциус вместе со мной — прекращай жить прошлым".

traits.locale_text: "Theodora trusted in established procedures — and she died. I won't make the same mistake. If you want to keep building the future of the von Valancius empire with me — stop living in the past."
"Theodora trusted in established procedures — and she died. I won't make the same mistake. If you want to keep building the future of the von Valancius empire with me — stop living in the past."
"Theodora trusted in established procedures — and she died. I won't make the same mistake. If you want to keep building the future of the von Valancius empire with me — stop living in the past."

"Theodora trusted in established procedures — and she died. I won't make the same mistake. If you want to keep building the future of the von Valancius protectorate with me — stop living in the past."

languages.text: “西奥多拉相信那套定下来的规矩，可她却死了，我不会犯同样的错误。如果你依然想和我一起建设冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的未来，就不要继续活在过去了。”
languages.original_text: "Theodora trusted in established procedures — and she died. I won't make the same mistake. If you want to keep building the future of the von Valancius protectorate with me — stop living in the past."

traits.locale_text: “西奥多拉相信那套定下来的规矩，可她却死了，我不会犯同样的错误。如果你依然想和我一起建设冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的未来，就不要继续活在过去了。”

languages.text: «Theodora confiaba en los procedimientos establecidos y eso solo la condujo a la muerte. Yo no repetiré sus errores. Si quiere seguir construyendo el futuro del protectorado von Valancius junto a mí, tendrá que dejar de vivir en el pasado».
languages.original_text: "Theodora trusted in established procedures — and she died. I won't make the same mistake. If you want to keep building the future of the von Valancius protectorate with me — stop living in the past."

traits.locale_text: «Theodora confiaba en los procedimientos establecidos y eso solo la condujo a la muerte. Yo no repetiré sus errores. Si quiere seguir construyendo el futuro del protectorado von Valancius junto a mí, tendrá que dejar de vivir en el pasado».

languages.text: 「シオドーラは確立された手順を信頼し…そして死んだ。私は同じ過ちは犯さない。私と一緒にフォン・ヴァランシウス保護領の未来を築き続けたいのなら、過去に生きるのはやめるのだな」
languages.original_text: "Theodora trusted in established procedures — and she died. I won't make the same mistake. If you want to keep building the future of the von Valancius protectorate with me — stop living in the past."

traits.locale_text: 「シオドーラは確立された手順を信頼し…そして死んだ。私は同じ過ちは犯さない。私と一緒にフォン・ヴァランシウス保護領の未来を築き続けたいのなら、過去に生きるのはやめるのだな」

languages.text: "Theodora hat auf etablierte Verfahren vertraut — und ist gestorben. Ich werde diesen Fehler nicht wiederholen. Wenn Ihr weiter mit mir gemeinsam die Zukunft des Protektorats von Valancius gestalten wollt, dann hört auf, in der Vergangenheit zu leben."
languages.original_text: "Theodora trusted in established procedures — and she died. I won't make the same mistake. If you want to keep building the future of the von Valancius protectorate with me — stop living in the past."

traits.locale_text: "Theodora hat auf etablierte Verfahren vertraut — und ist gestorben. Ich werde diesen Fehler nicht wiederholen. Wenn Ihr weiter mit mir gemeinsam die Zukunft des Protektorats von Valancius gestalten wollt, dann hört auf, in der Vergangenheit zu leben."

languages.text: « Théodora s'en remettait entièrement au protocole établi, et elle est morte. Je ne commettrai pas la même erreur. Si vous voulez vraiment assurer avec moi l'avenir du protectorat von Valancius, cessez donc de vivre dans le passé. »
languages.original_text: "Theodora trusted in established procedures — and she died. I won't make the same mistake. If you want to keep building the future of the von Valancius protectorate with me — stop living in the past."

traits.locale_text: « Théodora s'en remettait entièrement au protocole établi, et elle est morte. Je ne commettrai pas la même erreur. Si vous voulez vraiment assurer avec moi l'avenir du protectorat von Valancius, cessez donc de vivre dans le passé. »

languages.text: "Theodora, yerleşmiş prosedürlere güveniyordu. Sonunda ölüp gitti. Aynı hatayı yapmayacağım. Benimle birlikte von Valancius protektorasının geleceğini inşa etmek istiyorsan geçmişe mazi diyebilmelisin."
languages.original_text: "Theodora trusted in established procedures — and she died. I won't make the same mistake. If you want to keep building the future of the von Valancius protectorate with me — stop living in the past."

traits.locale_text: "Theodora, yerleşmiş prosedürlere güveniyordu. Sonunda ölüp gitti. Aynı hatayı yapmayacağım. Benimle birlikte von Valancius protektorasının geleceğini inşa etmek istiyorsan geçmişe mazi diyebilmelisin."
